# VOB - functions for object manipulation

## Vob_Rotate

```dae
func void Vob_Rotate(var string vobName, var C_Position vobPosition) {};
```

## Vob_MoveTo

```dae
func void Vob_MoveTo(var string vobName, var string pointName) {};
```

```dae

```

